item.title: Designing asset management in Amethyst
item.description: About two months ago, I decided to get started with Amethyst. However, I didn’t quite like the asset management, especially because it blocks the main thread. In this blog post, I describe how I designed the asset management for Amethyst. First experiments At first, I thought let’s try out these very promising futures. However, it turned out they weren’t as ergonomic as they seemed to be. For one, you have to either wait() for them or poll() them.
